items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress!
items.body: Bought for my son’s wedding. Had so many compliments on this dress. Felt very comfortable in it. I went by the measurements and got my right size. I got the size 8 and pretty true to the measurements. I wear between 6-8 sizes. Very well made. Read more
items.author: ladybuglisa

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Dress for many occasions
items.body: Ordered this in 14 because the 16 was too big. Fit is true with a little stretch for comfort of movement. Ordered the wine/burgundy color and it is very flattering on an olive skin tone. The length is long, I am 5'6" and still have about an inch and a half on the floor with no shoes on, so heels will need to be worn. The A Line of the bottom is flowy and elegant. Can't wait to wear this to the formal wedding we are attending. Read more
items.author: Rachel Carton

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely gorgeous
items.body: I’m 5’7, 175 lb, 36B, and my mid sections shows evidence of having had 5 babies. I got a size 12. This is a beautiful dress!! Well made, elegant, flattering fit and just lovely. It’s been a long time since I felt pretty in a piece of clothing. Fit perfectly everywhere and made my stomach look slimmer than it actually is. I was heartbroken when the bride said it was the “wrong” pink. It’s more of a dusty rose pink than pink pink. It looks different colors in different lighting and next to other pinks. I wish they made this dress in more colors. Read more
items.author: Phair Reviews

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress sizes run small
items.body: This is a beautiful dress. Sizes run small so the size I ordered was too small. Luckily the return process was very easy. The dress arrived on time and appeared to be made well. I would recommend this company. Read more
items.author: Rachelle L. Hammer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress
items.body: I followed the chart and ordered accordingly. Im 5'1"-178lbs. I knew it was going to be too long (just one of the joys of being 5'1") but the top part was too tight/restricting for my liking. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful material very flowy and it fit to size.
items.body: Beautiful material and fit to size. Read more
items.author: Amanda Miller

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Must be smaller busted
items.body: The bodice didn't fit right...I'm 38DD. The dress was nice Read more
items.author: CindyLou Who

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress for the wedding!
items.body: Very nice and comfortable! Was great for the wedding I attended. Read more
items.author: Karen Sue

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Ruched Sleeveless Maxi Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Ruched Sleeveless Maxi Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Orchid, Sky Blue, Deep Green, Burgundy, Burnt Orange, Black, Dusty Blue, Navy Blue, Slate Blue, Dusty Rose, Mint Green, Lavender, Pink, Ice Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
